pkgmetadata.longdescription: Deal with Dependencies // Tools to help manage dependencies during package development. This can retrieve all dependencies that are used in R files in the "R" directory, in Rmd files in "vignettes" directory and in 'roxygen2' documentation of functions. There is a function to update the Description file of your package and a function to create a file with the R commands to install all dependencies of your package. All functions to retrieve dependencies of R scripts and Rmd files can be used independently of a package development.
